title: Quests not updating....
body: I had been playing Odyssey Crash Site and I noticed my quests are not updating nor is it adding my games to the match history. I even managed to do a 5 man yasuo game.

replies.body: There's issues with mission not updating immediately, the same issue affects match history. If it hasn't updated soon (a few more hours), send a ticket to support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
I had the same issue but on captain mode I finished it after countless attempts but still not showing up :(
same.. spent hours trying to complete onslaught and once i finally did, it didnt appear in match history and i didnt complete mission :(
